sqoop.arg: SELECT _SP_PalletLabelID,PalletID,MachineStage,PartNumber,InvState,PalletNo,CreatedDT,CompleteDT,Quantity,LabelTemplate,PrinterURL,PrintedDT,ScannedDT,IsCancelled,IsReprint,PartDescription,LabelSaveDirectory,IsPrintLandscape,NoCopies,LabelsPerInventoryPack, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo._SP_PalletLabel WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionDeviceID,AcquisitionVariableTypeID,WorkstationConfigID,Instructions,ImageURI,RfSourceID,DataDeviceID,DeviceArgs,DeviceOutput,FillMode,Preset,Multiplier,PreprocessingFunction,IsManualTrigger,IsManualConfirm, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionDevice WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ActionNoteID,ActionID,Note,Comments,NoteDT,LoginID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionNote WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AssetID,AssetName,RfAssetTypeID,LineID,MachineStageID,ToolID,GaugeID,PartID,InventoryPackID,LocationID,IsRetired,CostCentreID,ManufacturerID,SupplierID,AcquiredDT,PONumber,OrderedDT,ExpectedDeliveryDT,ExpectedFirstUseDT,EndUseDT,EndUseReason,PurchaseCost,DefaultLocationID,Comments, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Asset WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AttributeTypeID,ProductTypeID,Name,Description,ImageURI,RfAttributeClassID,IsPassFail,IsRaiseCA,LikelyCauses,Impact,Weighting,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5,AttributeTypeCode, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AttributeType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT BOMVariantID,BOMVariant,PartID,IsDefault,BOMVariantIndex,IsRetired,LoginID,DT, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.BOMVariant WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ConcernStatusID,ConcernStatus,ConditionalFormat,IsClosedState, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ConcernStatus WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT DefectCountPID,MeasurementSetPID,HeadNo,DefectCount,Ignored,AttributeTypeID,ProductID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.DefectCountP WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT FaultStateID,FaultID,FromDT,ToDT,FaultStatusID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,OriginalLoginID,EditedFaultStateID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.FaultState WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT InventoryUsageID,StartUsingComments,StopUsingComments,StartLoginID,StopLoginID,OpenedStartDT,OpenedEndDT,SavedStartDT,SavedEndDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedInventoryUsageID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.InventoryUsage_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LineSectionID,LineSection,Description,IsRetired, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineSection WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LKConcernActionID,ConcernID,ActionID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkConcernAction WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkDocumentAssetID,DocumentID,AssetID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkDocumentAsset WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkInvPackInvPackID,InventoryPackFromID,InventoryPackToID,RfInventoryLinkTypeID,LoginID,ModifiedDT, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkInvPackInvPack WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStageID,MachineGroupID,LkMGMSID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkMGMS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkPartDocumentID,PartID,DocumentID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkPartDocument WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkSRGSRID,ScrapReasonGroupID,ScrapReasonID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkSRGSR WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VariableTypeGroupID,VariableTypeID,LkVTVTGID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkVTVTG WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStageEventTypeID,MachineStageEventType,Description,MachineStageTypeID,MachineStageEventTypeCode,IsAlarm,AlarmText, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStageEventType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceManHourPlannedID,MaintenanceProcedureID,PlannedManHours,PersonnelGroupID,SupplierID,SupplierCost, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceManHourPlanned WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceProcedureResultID,MaintenanceProcedureStepID,MaintenanceWorkID,Result,ResultPassFail,Comments,DT,CheckedByLoginID,MaintenanceProcedureStep,StepOrder,SubPartID,Component,RfMaintenanceCheckTypeID,RfSpecialActionTypeID,Test,USL,LSL,PersonnelGroupID,SupplierID,Nom,Units,DecPlaces, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceProcedureResult WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MaintenanceWorkStatusID,MaintenanceWorkStatus,Description,RfMaintenanceWorkStatusID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceWorkStatus WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCClientID,OPCClient,ComputerID,ModifiedDT,LastUpdateDT, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCClient WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCItemHistoryID,OPCItemID,UpdatedDT,RawValue,Value,Quality,CommittedDT, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCItemHistory WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCTextID,OPCItemID,Description,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCText WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PLCID,PLC,Description, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.PLC WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT RootCauseTypeID,RootCauseType,Description,RootCauseTypeCode, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.RootCauseType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SettingsPlantNameTemplatesID,CreateInvPackNoTemplate,CustomerUniqueKeyTemplate,InventoryPackNameTemplate,WONumberTemplate,ReceiveInvPackNoTemplate,BOMVariantTemplate, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SettingsPlantNameTemplates WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftTypeID,Name,Description,IsNonWorking, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ShiftType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCChartSetViewID,SPCChartSetView,Sequence,SPCChartSetID,RfChartSetViewTypeID,NoCols,NoRows,Caption,Tooltip,IsAggregated,RfCutByIDs,IsPanelled,ImageURI,GridImageRender,ParetoXAxis,ParetoStackBy,SPCChartSetViewStyleID,IsAutoFit,OverlayFlags, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartSetView WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCVarChartID,SPCRuleID,ProductID,AcquisitionID,MachineStageID,VariableTypeID,RfAttributeClassID,HeadNo,RfAcquisitionClassID,TrendStartMSID,TAGMSTYPE1ID,ATTRIBUTETYPEID,TAGMSVALUE1,CreateDT,LoginID,IsMsetInsert, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCVarChart WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagPartInstanceID,PartInstanceID,TagTypeID,TagValue,DT, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagPartInstance WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT TagProfileID,TagTypeID,EntryOrder,CompulsoryConditions,IsDefaulted,IsEncrypted,TagListID,IsReadOnly,RptQueryID,TagTypeInTagProfileID,TagTreeID,RfTagDataSourceID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagTypeInTagProfile WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Tool_Custom WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolStateID,ToolID,FromDT,ToDT,RfToolStatusID,LoginID,Comments,OpenedDT,SavedDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolState WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT UnitCountTypeID,UnitCountType,Description,MachineStageTypeID,DefaultUnitID,IsQuantityIn,IsQuantityOut,IsMaintenanceCount,IsConvertableToBaseUnits,AssetCountTypeID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.UnitCountType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VariableTypeGroupID,Name,Description,VariableTypeGroupCode,IsSmartGroup,SmartGroupPattern, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VariableTypeGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT WorkInstructionResultID,WorkInstructionStepID,OperationID,DT,Comments,LoginID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WorkInstructionResult WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStop.MachineStopID, MachineStop.MachineStopReasonID, MachineStop.FromDT, MachineStop.ToDT, MachineStop.MachineStageID, MachineStop.IsEdited, MachineStop.RevisionNo, MachineStop_.StopComments, MachineStop_.StartComments, MachineStop_.StartLoginID, MachineStop_.StopLoginID, MachineStop_.OpenedStopDT, MachineStop_.SavedStopDT, MachineStop_.OpenedStartDT, MachineStop_.SavedStartDT, MachineStop_.OriginalLoginID, MachineStop_.EditedMachineStopID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM MachineStop FULL JOIN MachineStop_ ON (MachineStop.MachineStopID = MachineStop_.MachineStopID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
